comments: She was by far amazing. I felt like I was flying with a friend rather than a CFI. She kept me going, even through the roughest parts of training. She is amazing and I wish I still had her for my Instrument course. Best one to have, be excited if you have Doskow!

Hard but helpful. She wants you to know everything about flying which is reasonable. She is a great pilot, but she wants you to fly as good as she does. Cute to look at, but difficult to keep a friendly conversation with while taking about something other than flying.

Great CFI, can be a little strict at first but once you get to know her, she\'ll be extremely friendly and helpful with whatever you need, even if she has to go out of her way to do so. Wish I could keep her for my 221 course.
